module: Module-level comment: This module implements a CODEC2 speech encoder for 2400 bps mode. It processes 150 frames of speech data using a state machine, encoding 10 frames (140-149) into bit streams. The module utilizes multiple RAM blocks for speech samples, intermediate values, and encoded bits. It iterates through frames, calling a sub-module (CODEC2_encoder_one_frame_mode2400) for each frame's encoding process. The module manages memory access, state transitions, and outputs the encoded bits for the final 10 frames upon completion.
